column2: UMH Properties, Inc. operates as a real estate investment trust. The company is headquartered in Freehold, New Jersey and currently employs 380 full-time employees. The firm's primary business is the ownership and operation of manufactured home communities, including leasing manufactured home sites to private manufactured home owners. The firm also leases homes to residents, and through its taxable REIT subsidiary, UMH Sales and Finance, Inc. (S&F), conducts manufactured home sales in its communities. The firm owns approximately 122 manufactured home communities consisting of approximately 23,000 developed homesites. The communities are located in New Jersey, New York, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Indiana, Maryland and Michigan. In connection with the operation of its communities, UMH also leases homes to prospective tenants. These rental homes are owned by the Company and rented to residents.
Juniper Business Plaza, 3499 Route 9 N, Suite 3-C
